class GameTest extends Object

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    calculateWinTest()
    test checks if calculateWin method works as expected in normal condition
    void
    calculateWinTieTest()
    test checks if calculateWin method works correctly in case of a tie
    void
    setGameAndRemoveCards()
    Method setGameAndRemoveCards initialize a non-expert game and remove a specific card from the deck, it is an additional function used in tests
    void
    setNotExpertGame()
    Method setNotExpertGame initialize a non-expert game, it is an additional function used in tests
    void
    setNotExpertGameThreePlayers()
    Method setNotExpertGameThreePlayers initialize a non-expert game with three players, it is an additional function used in tests
    void
    setNotExpertGameTwoPlayers()
    Method setNotExpertGameTwoPlayers initialize a non-expert game with two players, it is an additional function used in tests
    void
    setPlanning()
    Method setPlanning initialize a non-expert game with two players and define the order of play of the players, it is an additional function used in tests
    void
    testAddPlayer()
    test check if the addPlayer method add the player in the game It is expected not to throw exceptions
    void
    testAddTooManyPlayers()
    the test check that the addPlayer method doesn't add a third player into a two players game It is expected to throw a WrongGamePhaseException
    void
    testAlreadyChosenCard(it.polimi.ingsw.model.player.Card card)
    the test checks that the Player cannot choose a Card that he has already chosen The method chosenCard is expected to throw a NotValidMoveException
    void
    testAlreadyChosenCloud(it.polimi.ingsw.model.Clan clan, int islandIndex, int cloudIndex)
    tests that two players cannot choose the same cloud the method chosenCloud is expected to throw a NotValidMoveException
    void
    testChooseTheSameCard()
    the test check if, with a full deck, the player, who is the currPlayer, can't choose the same card played by the other one On the second time the method is expected to throw a NotValidMoveException
    void
    testChosenCard()
    the test checks if the chosenCard method correctly throws a WrongPlayerException if and only if the Player who choose the card is not the currentPlayer The method is expected to throw a WrongPlayerException if the Player, who is not the Current one, chose the card The method is expected not to throw any exception if the current Player chose the card, and the increase of the indexCurrPlayer
    void
    testChosenCloud(it.polimi.ingsw.model.Clan clan, int islandIndex, int cloudIndex)
    the test checks if the chosenCloud method let the current player pick a cloud which is not empty It is expected not to throw any exception
    void
    testEndTurn(it.polimi.ingsw.model.Clan clan, int islandIndex, int cloudIndex)
    checks if, after that the first Player ends his turn, the endTurn method instantiates a new turn the method endTurn is expected not to throw any exception
    void
    testEndTurnBeforeTime(it.polimi.ingsw.model.Clan clan, int islandIndex)
    the test checks that it isn't possible to call the endTurn method in a non-valid position the method endTurn is expected to throw a NotValidMoveException
    void
    testInitialGameMethods()
    the test check that the start method choose a player that is actually added in the game Is expected that, in a game of two players, the indexNextFirstPlayer is between 0 and 1
    void
    testMoveMotherNature(it.polimi.ingsw.model.Clan clan)
    tests if with the moveMotherNature method the current player moves Mother Nature on a chosen Island
    void
    testMoveMotherNatureTooMuch(it.polimi.ingsw.model.Clan clan)
    the test checks that the currPlayer cannot move the Mother Nature more than the Max steps written on the card he played A NotValidMoveException is expected to be thrown
    void
    testMoveStudentToChamber(it.polimi.ingsw.model.Clan clan)
    the test checks that the moveStudentToChamber removes a student from the Hall and adds a student in the Chamber of the Current Player
    void
    testMoveStudentToIsland(it.polimi.ingsw.model.Clan clan)
    the test check that the method moveStudentToIsland move a chosen student from the hall to an Island
    void
    testNotCorrectPhaseToChooseCard()
    the test checks that the player cannot choose a card in a non PLANNING phase of the game The method chosenCard is expected to throw a WrongGamePhaseException if gameState is not PLANNING
    void
    testNotStudentsToMoveToChamber(it.polimi.ingsw.model.Clan clan)
    tests that the current player can't move a student to Chamber if the student is not in the hall method moveStudentToChamber is expected to throw a NotValidMoveException
    void
    testNotStudentsToMoveToIsland(it.polimi.ingsw.model.Clan clan)
    tests that the current player can't move a student to an island if the student is not in the hall The method moveStudentToIsland is expected to throw a NotValidMoveException
    void
    testOnlyOneLeftChooseCard()
    the test checks that it is possible to choose the same card of the other Player if it is the only one in the Deck the test checks that the Action order, in this particular case, is created taking into account who first chose the card The method chosenCard is expected not to throw any exception, and the playersOrder is expected to have in position 0 the first player who chose the card
    void
    testOrderActionPhase()
    the test verifies that the order of the action phase is created in the right way, that is, starting from who has chosen a card with a lower priority
    void
    testWrongPlayerChooseCloud(it.polimi.ingsw.model.Clan clan, int islandIndex, int cloudIndex)
    checks that a non-current player cannot choose a cloud the method chosenCloud is expected to throw a WrongPlayerException
    void
    testWrongPlayerMoveStudentToChamber(it.polimi.ingsw.model.Clan clan)
    the test check that a non-current player can't move a student to the Chamber method moveStudentToChamber is expected to throw a WrongPlayerException
    void
    testWrongPlayerMoveStudentToIsland(it.polimi.ingsw.model.Clan clan)
    tests that a player, who is not the current one, can't move a student to an Island The method moveStudentToIsland is expected to throw a WrongPlayerException
